highlights: Collaborated with senior engineers in development of internal Python-based REST APIs.
Aided in agile development of automated incident handling system, saving over 350 manual hours yearly.
Engaged in a diverse range of educational and networking workshops facilitated by senior level staff, including C-level executives.
Enhanced the development and delivery of diverse internal curricula, focusing primarily on Web Development, iOS Development, and React.js, catering to 50+ high school students.
Delivered personalized one-on-one coaching to students on programming projects and career preparation.
Assisted with providing maintenance to the classroom space and the technology within.
Assisted instructional team in the delivery of a web development curriculum to 40+ high school students.
Led instruction of curriculum modules at least 3 times per week.
Hosted office hours for students to assist them with coding concepts and projects covered in class.
Participated in the delivery of a computer science fundamentals curriculum to 30+ high school students at The Renaissance Charter School.
Introduced students to creative coding and hardware programming with Python.
Managed classroom logistics, such as attendance and grading.

projects.description: A site which provides concise code snippet explanations using OpenAI's GPT 3.5 davinci text model.
